title: Primordial black hole numbers: standard formulas and charts
abstract:
This brief note presents standard computations of primordial black hole mass
$M$ given perturbations of scale $k$, and their late-time abundance
$\Omega_\text{PBH}$ given their initial density fraction $\beta$. I recap the
assumptions made in these computations and present formulas and reference
charts useful for a working cosmologist.
